name: All Things Wishful
tag_list: gift, registry, cash-registry, wedding, alternative-registry, green-registry
overview:
All Things Wishful is a fun and unique platform for getting the gifts you want for any occasion - weddings, baby showers, graduations, housewarming, retirements and special birthdays - and any type of fundraising.

With All Things Wishful, you are not limited to items sold in specific stores or in a particular price range - we are all about giving you flexibility and convenience. You can request anything you want, including experiences! All you have to do is choose a picture to represent the item you want using our image library or by uploading your own picture.

After you choose the picture, you tell us how much you need to raise to get the item. All Things Wishful divides the image into a grid of clickable tiles based on the price you set.

Tell your friends about your registry by sending them your unique All Things Wishful URL, and you’re ready to start receiving.

Your friends choose an item from your registry and use our clickable tiles to let us know which portions of the items they would like to buy you.

We collect the funds from your friends and deposit them into your Amazon Payments account; you watch your balance grow.

With your funds, you can get what you want, when you want and from where you want. You don’t have to worry about shipping and handling charges, getting rid of packaging and returning gifts that you don’t want.
